text: Luis Razo (born 25 September 1940) is a Mexican equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Mexico Category:Equestrians at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Pan American Games medalists in equestrian Category:Pan American Games silver medalists for Mexico Category:Equestrians at the 1975 Pan American Games Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Luis Razo
